title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI/API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull, list and delete models via simple async/sync calls.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration: chat, embeddings and tool-calling wrappers around Ollama.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama-cli (sugarforever/ollama-cli)
summary: Interactive TUI for chatting, model search/pull and conversation history; built with Python Rich.

title: ollama-copilot (cmiscm/ollama-copilot)
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into inline Copilot with autocomplete & chat sidebar.

title: ollama-helm (otwld/ollama-helm)
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & autoscaling support.

title: ollama4j (ollama4j/ollama4j)
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama covering chat, generate, embeddings, pull/list and custom options.

title: ollama-rb (ollama/ollama-rb)
summary: Official Ruby gem: idiomatic client with async support and Rails-friendly helpers.

title: ollama-chat (jmorganca/ollama-chat)
summary: Minimal React chat app bootstrapped with Vite; demonstrates streaming fetch to Ollama API.

title: ollama-docker (ggerganov/ollama-docker)
summary: Multi-arch Docker image for Ollama with CUDA and ROCm variants; updated on every release.

title: ollama-express (mattzcarey/ollama-express)
summary: Express.js REST proxy adding JWT auth, rate-limit and OpenAI-format endpoints atop Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack (deepset-ai/haystack-ollama)
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for pipelines.

title: ollama-rs (pepperoni21/ollama-rs)
summary: Rust crate with async/tokio support for chat, generate, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-csharp (awaescher/ollama-csharp)
summary: .NET 8 client library with DI-friendly IOllamaClient and full async streaming coverage.

title: ollama-discord (rizerphe/ollama-discord)
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that streams Ollama replies in threads with slash commands and model picker.

title: ollama-slack (mickume/ollama-slack)
summary: Slack Bolt app that answers DMs and mentions using any Ollama model; easy docker run.

title: ollama-obsidian (joethei/ollama-obsidian)
summary: Obsidian plugin for AI-assisted writing: generate, summarize, translate and chat inside notes.

title: ollama-npm (npm search)
summary: Curated npm packages: official ollama JS client, langchain-ollama, ollama-ai, ollama-express and more.
